name: kill the ants (Fahrul Adib)
description:
Hi, this time I'm trying to remake one of the popular games in the Playstore at that time, Ant Smasher

Of course this game is not perfect, but I promise if I reach 50 followers, I will provide a tutorial on how to make this game on my YouTube channel, and I will also add some other mechanics such as adding skins, shop, etc.

Subscribe to my YouTube to find out about game developers

Give a comment below if you want me to make the tutorial and the source code for free

HAVE A NICE PLAY :)

===========================================================
===========================================================
BAHASA INDONESIA :

Hai, kali ini saya mencoba untuk remake salah satu game yang populer di playstore pada masanya yaitu Ant Smasher

tentunya game ini belum sempurna, tetapi saya berjanji jika saya mencapai 50 follower, saya akan memberikan tutorial tentang cara membuat game ini di channel youtube saya, dan saya juga akan menambahkan beberapa mekanik lain seperti menambahkan skin, shop, dll.

Subscribe youtube saya untuk mengetahui tentang seputar game developer

Berikan komentar dibawah jika kalian ingin saya membuatkan tutorial dan source code nya gratis

SELAMAT BERMAIN :)

Subscribe My Youtube Channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCWfCyOLSMM61b-YWPq6cOmA/videos
